org.uno.IncidenceMgmtSystem.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uno.IncidenceMgmtSystem.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the user controller.Any requests coming from the view by either GET or POST is directed here. User Controller directs the requests to specific service layers.

      java.lang.String signup(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      As soon as user clicks on signup on view then controller's method signup runs.Since it is requesting for the signup page therefore the GET METHOD runs

        @RequestMapping(value="/signup",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String signup(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                                                             User user,
                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        As soon as user clicks on signup on view then controller's method signup runs.Since it is submitting data for the signup page therefore the POST METHOD runs
        Parameters:
        model -
        Returns:
        signup/login Invokes the signup.jsp if it has errors or user already exists OTHERWISE it redirects to login.jsp
